favourite.article: It reminds me to be exact in everything.
The song have something to do with my character. It tells me of how to be E-X-A-C-T. I will always sing this song to check my character.
Wow... Lord I love You. You make our character so fine.
How I love to sing this song... It reminds me to be exact. Amen. This will help me a lot. Praise the Lord!!!
To be exact is very important.
I like to sing this song because it deals with my character.
